page.title: 13Dalkeith Police Station
page.content:
The present building is Divisional Headquarters of 'E' Division which was opened in 1980. Police staffing consists of 25 male and 3 female officers. 36 civilian staff are also employed. Working day is as follows:
0700 hrs - 1500 hrs 1500 hrs - 2300 hrs 2300 hrs - 0700 hrs
Starting salary of a constable is Â£6,708. Apart from everyday police work there are 3 other departments. CID, Traffic, Community Involvement.
The local area covered stretches from Soutra Hill to Danderhall and all lands east of the A68 to Musselburgh boundary.
